name: Swipe Owls
description:
Swipe Owls is a simple yet addictive puzzle game. You swipe groups of 3 or more same owls. Swipe as many groups as possible until one column reaches the top of the screen. Gear up for this entertaining and casual game and you won't be able to put this game down for hours.

Tip: Long chain will give you bonus score.

Features:
EASTER EGG THEME included.
Fun of swiping.
Very cute and clean graphics.
High quality sound effects.
Game Center leaderboards.
Endless game, unlimited fun.

Enjoy!
